summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to City Officer and employee benefits and providing for group medical, dental, voluntary group term life and accidental death and dismemberment insurance for eligible officers and employees of the City; conditionally authorizing the Personnel Director to select, contract for, administer, and modify said programs for the benefit of such personnel; creating the Group Term Life Insurance Fund, and the Health Care Fund, and modifying SMC Chapter 5.76, accordingly; and repealing SMC Chapters 4.48, 4.52, 4.56 and 4.60.
